unittitle_ssm: Alexander C. Tompkins military appointment and certificate
abstract_ssm: This collection includes a document appointing Alexander C. Tompkins as a Private in the Westchester County-based 17th Regiment of the New York State Militia, dated 1864, and a certificate recognizing Tompkins as a contributor to the erection of the Washington Monument in Washington, D.C., circa 1880.
collection_ssm: Alexander C. Tompkins military appointment and certificate
heading_ssm: Alexander C. Tompkins military appointment and certificate

collection_sim: Alexander C. Tompkins military appointment and certificate
